packages.name: Hubitat Hub Information Device
packages.description: Device driver that provides access to the basic hub and location information about the hub.  Has an option to allow polling to report hub temperature and memory.

packages.name: Notification Tile Device
packages.description: Device driver that can serve as a destination for notifications. Formats the notifications for display on an attribute tile.

packages.name: Dashboard Variable Device
packages.description: This is a psuedo Global Variable Connector that works with RM or webCoRE to provide a bi-directional interface to the Variable Tile.  Was written primarily to give webCoRE users a method of working with the variable tile without requiring the creation of an RM global variable and connector.

packages.name: HubConnect Hub Information Driver
packages.description: Hub Information Driver stub for HubConnect v2

packages.name: Hubitat Ping Device
packages.description: Device driver that provides a wrapper for the Hubitat Ping endpoint.  sendPing command accepts an IPv4 sring and will send it to the hub, which will do 5 ICMP requests.  Optionally, can be set through the preferences to repeat the ping command on a specified interval.  Returns: percentLoss, avg, min, max, mdev, pingReturn, and presence.  Implements capabilities Acutator, Configuration, and Presence.

packages.name: Device Details Display
packages.description: Simple application that displays the capabilities, attributes (summary and detail, commands (summary and detail) and device data for devices selected.  Allows for the quick comparison of multiple devices.

packages.name: Moon Phase Device
packages.description: Device driver to calculate the moon phase for a given or current date/time.  Attributes include a moon phase text string, the a moon phase number (percentage, in decimal format, that the given time/date is through the lunar cycle, and a generated tile string.  Driver optionally will automatically update the attributes at 1 second past midnight to keep the phase current, and allows for an path to an alternate set of tile icons (i.e. hub file system - http://hubIpAddress/local/).

packages.name: Even Day Switch
packages.description: Device driver creates a virtual switch that is set on/off based on whether the day of the year is even or odd. To handle end of year processing the driver can optionally switch the even/odd on/off to ensure that the every other day on/off is maintained.

packages.name: Hubitat Hub Information Driver Aggregation
packages.description: Application allows multiple instances of the Hub Information Driver to be displayed in one space. Also permits the creation of a customized html attribute that can be displayed on a dashboard attribute tile.

packages.name: Hub Monitor
packages.description: Application allows monitoring of multiple instances of the Hub Information Driver, and will generate notifications for temperature, database size, free memory and IP address changes.

packages.name: Hub Variable Sync
packages.description: Application allows the synchronization of hub variables across multiple hubs.

packages.name: Custom Device Note
packages.description: Application allows for the addition of custom notes to devices in the Data section under the Device Details on the device page.

packages.name: SynAccess PDU Driver
packages.description: Driver that supports the usage of a SynAccess PDU through the telnet interface.  Driver creates a child device for each outlet to enable individual power control.

packages.name: Device Data Item Display
packages.description: Provides a mechanism for displaying data item values across multiple devices.

packages.name: File Manager Device
packages.description: Device Driver to allow reading, writing, and appending of text based files in Hubitat\'s Local File Manager.

packages.name: Web Scraper Device
packages.description: Scrapes a web site for a search string and returns data based on offset of the search.  Can be run as a one time or a periodic search

packages.name: Daikin Thermostat
packages.description: Device driver for the Daikin OnePlus Thermostat.

packages.name: File Manager for Extended Character Sets
packages.description: Provides File Manager support for text files containing extended character sets.

packages.name: Device Data Editor
packages.description: Quick Editor for the items in the Data area on the Device Page.  Also permits the addition of new items into the data section.

packages.name: Daily Reminder
packages.description: App uses a simple text file as input to generate daily reminder notices.

packages.name: Tile Template Generator
packages.description: Creates a template file based on a device driver's exposed attributes. Templates can be used to create dashboard tiles using Tile Template Device Manager.

packages.name: Tile Template Device Manager
packages.description: Manages the merging of data from a device driver, and an assigned template to create an HTML output attribute that can be used on the Dashboard.

packages.name: Tile Multi-Device Template Manager
packages.description: Manages the merging of data from multiple device drivers, and an assigned template to create an HTML output attribute that can be used on the Dashboard.

packages.name: Nexia Thermostat Manager
packages.description: Port of the ST Nexia Thermostat Manager.  Known work with the XL850 and XL824 Thermostat; may work with any thermostat running off of the TraneHome.com cloud.

packages.name: Danfoss Ally Master
packages.description: Provides integration with the Danfoss Ally Thermostats and Room Sensors.

packages.name: Advanced Honeywell T6 Pro
packages.description: Advanced driver for the Honeywell T6 Pro Z-Wave thermostat - the baseline code is from v1.2 bcopeland driver.  Provides access to all 42 device parameters, Clock synchronization, and Power Source Monitoring, in addition to the standard thermostat functions

packages.name: Air Things View Plus API Integration
packages.description: Provides the interface and device(s) to integrate the Air Things (aka AirThings) View Plus hub and sensors with Hubitat(TM).

packages.name: HPM Manifest Generator
packages.description: Developers utility that automates the generation of an HPM Manifest, and the merge entry for the Repository.

packages.name: Hub Failover Manager
packages.description: Hubitat® Elevation Higher Availability (HE-Ha)  For homes where automation of the environment has become the expected condition it is highly disruptive when a key component fails. In the Hubitat® environment, the loss of the hub is significant, and while the Hub Protection service provides for a replacement hub and permits restoration of the hub’s data and radios there is a delay before the restoration can occur due to shipping. In the ideal world, a secondary hub would be on hot standby and would automatically assume control of the environment if it detected a failure (loss of communication in the primary hub).

packages.name: Zigbee-ZWave Radio Toggle Buttons
packages.description: Provides a set of buttons to enable/disable the Zigbee/ZWave radios.

packages.name: Message Rotator Tile Device
packages.description: Message Rotator Tile device allows for multiple messages to be stored via RM, webCoRE, manually, etc. and then rotated to display on an attribute tile.

packages.name: Room Information Device
packages.description: Provides a JSON summary of all Rooms and their associated devices and images.

packages.name: Hub Information Driver v3
packages.description: Rewrite of the original Hub Information Driver.  Driver includes 40+ attributes related to the operation and general fitness of the hub.

packages.name: File Manager Backup & Restore
packages.description: Allows for the creation and restore of a compressed backup of all files contained in the Hub's local File Manager

packages.name: Power Outage Manager
packages.description: Monitors devices with Power Source capability and initiates actions when the powerSource attribute switches from battery to mains indicating a power outage.  Can also initiate actions when power is restored.
